title: Jackson returns in style as Ravens rout Dolphins
content: After starting 1-5, the Ravens have won two straight and Lamar Jackson has them in position for a possible run.

title: Woodward out as LSU AD amid Landry's criticism
content: Scott Woodward is out as LSU's athletic director, the school announced Thursday night, with the ouster coming in the wake of Gov. Jeff Landry's criticism of him earlier this week.

title: Sources: WNBA, players extend CBA for 30 days
content: The WNBA and WNBPA agreed Thursday to a 30-day extension of the current collective bargaining agreement through Nov. 30, sources confirmed.

title: Sources: NBA, books review most vulnerable bets
content: The NBA and its partner sportsbook have had ongoing discussions on what types of bets are most vulnerable to manipulation and what betting limits are appropriate for such bets, sources told ESPN.

title: Ohtani roles for potential G7 include opener, OF
content: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts will consider using Shohei Ohtani as an opener or even as an outfielder in a potential Game 7 against the Blue Jays.

title: Jackson prevails in HBCU coaching clash vs. Vick
content: DeSean Jackson's Delaware State team has defeated Michael Vick's Norfolk State 27-20 in a historic matchup of Black college coaches.

title: Boxer Davis sued over new domestic allegations
content: Boxing star Gervonta Davis is facing a new set of legal issues after an ex-girlfriend filed a civil lawsuit in Miami-Dade County accusing him of battery, aggravated battery, false imprisonment, kidnapping and intentional infliction of emotional distress.

title: NCAA hoops tourneys to use availability reports
content: The NCAA will implement player availability reports for the 2026 men's and women's basketball tournaments in March.

title: Rodgers pitches GB stars on house, even in-game
content: Steelers QB Aaron Rodgers is still trying to get Packers players to buy his house in Green Bay, including Micah Parsons, who was pitched on the idea after a play.

title: WNBA, union agree to CBA extension -- what's next in negotiations?
content: The league and WNBPA agreed to a 30-day extension of the current CBA. How did we get here and what happens next?

title: Which NFL teams should make trades before the deadline? Barnwell sizes up expectations for all 32
content: Could the Lions add help? Will the Jets trade stars? Should the Giants make any moves? Let's look at which teams might swing deadline deals.

title: What we're hearing about the open Power 4 college football jobs and what comes next
content: Coaching changes are happening fast. With a month left in the season, here are six things to monitor.

title: With Rhule, Cignetti off the list, who are the top candidates for Penn State
content: Penn State is looking for a new coach, but lost two targets. It's still one of the best in the cycle.

title: The comprehensive guide to the women's hoops season, including preseason picks
content: Who's winning the 2026 national title (UConn? UCLA? South Carolina? LSU?) and other preseason picks, predictions.

title: Storylines to watch in all 31 men's basketball conferences
content: Will UConn or St. John's win the Big East? Here are questions that could shape every league in 2025-26.

title: 'I didn't even know he was a gambler': How the Blazers and NBA are grappling with Chauncey Billups' stunning downfall
content: The questions inside the Blazers' locker room and across the NBA are the same: How do we reconcile the man we thought we knew -- and a man the federal government believes is a criminal?

title: Timeline of past century's major pro sports gambling scandals
content: A history of the consequences when players, coaches and referees cross the line into the betting world.

title: 'We've got to figure something out': Dodgers must start hitting -- or this World Series is over
content: A lineup full of All-Stars has looked off all postseason long -- and especially in the Fall Classic. Can L.A. fix it before it's too late?

title: Sources: Feds eye MLBPA venture over spending
content: Players Way was cited in an anonymous whistleblower complaint last November that triggered an ongoing criminal investigation by the U.S. Attorney's Office in Brooklyn.

title: Week 10 preview: Why Georgia's matchup with Florida just means more, plus key matchups
content: Key matchups and the story behind why Georgia quarterback Gunner Stockton really wants a win against Florida.

title: How Vanderbilt has gone from SEC doormat to CFP contender
content: After years of being a punching bag, coach Clark Lea and the 7-1 Commodores are showing plenty of fight.

title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 9
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: Playoff push: Trade targets and what to expect from murky RB rotations
content: What to make of backfield rotations, players on the rise and who to target as we approach the fantasy playoffs.

title: Inside Marcus Kowal's fight to change America's drunken driving laws
content: Marcus Kowal, an ex-MMA fighter, wants to change American drunken driving laws after the tragic death of his 15-month-old son.

title: The next generation of entertainers: 15 young stars lighting up Europe
content: Bill Connelly shines a spotlight on 15 under-21 players who have begun to make a name for themselves on Europe's biggest stages.

title: Lakers' Jake LaRavia turns Anthony Edwards' question into a caption
content: Anthony Edwards' courtside commentary and Jake LaRavia's 27-point night turned a shorthanded matchup into an instant classic.

title: NBA Cup: Let's project group favorites and the teams fighting for a wild-card spot
content: The third edition of the in-season tournament tips off on Friday. Let's take a look at who has the best chance to advance to Vegas in December.

title: Nebraska's black alternate uniforms headline best Week 10 threads in CFB
content: The Cornhuskers are going with an all-black look for their prime-time matchup with USC on Saturday night.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Two win streaks on the line at UFC Fight Night
content: One fighter's unbeaten streak will come to an end when David Onama and Steve Garcia clash at UFC Fight Night. MMA experts and a betting insider make their picks.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye possible move for Osimhen
content: Could Barcelona end up signing Victor Osimhen from Galatasaray? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: What we've learned: Arsenal's struggles; Spurs' defense impresses
content: The Women's Super League is through six games this season and returns after international break. But what have we learned so far?

title: Survivor pool strategy: Rams, Chargers among top options in Week 9
content: NFL survivor pool strategy, predictions and picks for ESPN Eliminator Challenge Week 9, including teams to pick or save for later.

title: 'Toughest player I've ever seen': The Legend of Haynes King
content: Stories about how the quarterback became one of the quirkiest, toughest and most insatiable players in college football.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Giannis is a one-man show this season
content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from Giannis Antetokounmpo, Nikola Jokic and other notables around the NBA this season.

title: 'Final day for audition': How Rohit Aarrya pulled off Mumbai hostage siege; his warning to cops
content: A social entrepreneur held 17 children, an elderly woman, and a staffer hostage for three hours at a Mumbai recording studio. After failed negotiations, police stormed the studio, shooting the captor in self-defense when he fired an air gun. The man, who claimed he wanted to be heard, was declared dead at the hospital.

title: Rashtriya Ekta Diwas: PM Modi pays tribute to Sardar Patel — Watch video
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi honored Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel at the Statue of Unity on 'Rashtriya Ekta Diwas'. The PM offered prayers and floral tributes, emphasizing Patel's pivotal role in India's integration and his enduring legacy of national integrity. A video highlighting Patel's life and achievements was also shared by the Prime Minister

title: Shah says Rahul’s 'maternal roots' in Italy; accuses him of 'insulting' Chhath
content: Union home minister Amit Shah criticized Rahul Gandhi for allegedly insulting Chhath Puja, attributing it to his "maternal home" in Italy and ignorance of Indian culture.

title: 'No 3s being No 1s': Jemimah revives Gambhir’s 2011 heroics
content: Jemimah Rodrigues delivered a match-winning unbeaten 127, drawing comparisons to Gautam Gambhir's 2011 World Cup final knock. Her brilliant century anchored India's record-breaking 339-run chase against Australia, propelling them into the ICC Women's World Cup final.  Rodrigues' composed performance, alongside Harmanpreet Kaur's 89, secured a historic five-wicket victory.

title: Lenskart IPO opens today: Should you subscribe? Check GMP, price band & what analysts say
content: Eyewear giant Lenskart is launching its IPO on Friday, aiming to raise Rs 2,150 crore to fund store expansion, technology, and marketing. With a price band of Rs 382-Rs 402, analysts recommend subscribing for the long term, citing its strong business model and market leadership. The company's robust financial growth and international expansion plans are key highlights.

title: Jio partners with Google: Offers free Gemini Pro AI model worth Rs 35,100; how to claim
content: Reliance Jio is offering its subscribers 18 months of free access to Google's Gemini 2.5 AI Pro model, a significant move to democratize AI in India. This collaboration aims to empower citizens and businesses with advanced AI tools, following similar initiatives by competitors. The offer is initially available to Jio users aged 18-25 via the MyJio app.

title: Hack of the day: Set app time limits to stop endless scrolling
content: Regain control of your screen time with a simple hack. Major social media apps like Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube offer built-in time limit features. This guide provides step-by-step instructions to set daily limits, helping you stay focused and manage your device usage effectively.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens flat; BSE Sensex below 84,400
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Friday on mixed global cues. While Nifty50 was near 25,850, BSE Sensex was below 84,400.

title: Sushant’s sister claims psychics told her he was ‘murdered by two people'
content: Late actor Sushant Singh Rajput’s sister, Shweta Singh Kirti, has reignited conversations surrounding her brother’s tragic death with startling revelations. Speaking in a recent interview, she claimed that two psychics — one based in the United States and another in Mumbai — told her that Sushant was “murdered by two people” and did not die by suicide.

title: Amazon job cuts: CEO Andy Jassy warned months in advance; claims ‘will need more people’
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy warned employees in June 2025 about AI's impact on the corporate workforce, four months before announcing 14,000 job cuts. Despite record profits, the company is streamlining operations, with further reductions anticipated as AI adoption accelerates and necessitates a leaner structure.

title: 'I was crying every day': Jemimah breaks down; reveals battle with anxiety
content: Jemimah Rodrigues, India's World Cup hero, emotionally revealed her battle with anxiety and self-doubt after her match-winning century against Australia.  She shared how family, friends, and faith helped her overcome a difficult tournament start, leading to a historic win and a place in the final. Her courage in vulnerability resonated deeply.

title: 'Been there six times': How Nasa dismissed Kim Kardashian’s moon-landing doubts - Watch
content: NASA has firmly refuted reality star Kim Kardashian's claims questioning the 1969 moon landing.  Acting administrator Sean Duffy clarified that animations, not actual footage, were misinterpreted by broadcasters.  NASA confirmed that astronauts indeed walked on the moon, having successfully completed six missions to its surface.

title: How Epstein ties led to Prince Andrew's ouster; what's next for him?
content: King Charles III has stripped Prince Andrew of his royal title and ordered him to leave his Windsor residence, Royal Lodge. This drastic action follows intense public pressure and scrutiny over his association with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.  Andrew, who denies allegations of sexual assault, will relocate to a property on the King's Sandringham estate.

title: 'More investment’: Intel’s fired CEO reacts to Nvidia’s US chip move; shares post online
content: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger applauded Nvidia's decision to manufacture its advanced AI chips in Arizona, emphasizing the need for resilient US semiconductor supply chains. Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang confirmed Blackwell GPUs are in production in Arizona, a move initiated by President Trump's call to bring manufacturing back for national security and economic reasons.

title: Is US running out of pennies? Trump’s cost-cutting plan leaves retailers counting losses
content: America faces a severe penny shortage after President Trump halted production. Retailers and banks are struggling with cash transactions, with some businesses offering incentives to bring pennies back. The abrupt decision, aimed at cost-saving, has left commerce in disarray, prompting calls for government clarity as the holiday season approaches.

title: Women’s WC: Jemimah scripts history; IND pull off biggest WODI chase to enter final
content: Jemimah Rodrigues' career-defining 127 not out powered India to a stunning five-wicket victory over Australia in the Women's ODI World Cup semifinal. Chasing a massive 339, India's improbable chase was anchored by Rodrigues' magnificent century, guiding them to their maiden World Cup final against South Africa. This historic win marks a monumental achievement for Indian women's cricket.

title: Tyreek Hill’s season over? Check details on his injury & future with Dolphins
content: Miami Dolphins' star receiver Tyreek Hill faces a season-ending knee injury, potentially sidelining him until 2026.  Torn ligaments require surgery, casting doubt on his future with the team.  League sources suggest Miami might release him due to his contract and ongoing domestic violence allegations.  Hill's recovery and NFL standing are now uncertain.

title: Stefon Diggs linked to Drake’s ‘Kiki’ pregnancy while expecting with Cardi B
content: A shocking rumour has emerged concerning NFL star Stefon Diggs.  While Cardi B is confirmed to be pregnant with his child, DJ Akademiks alleges Diggs also got K'yanna Barber pregnant. Barber is famously known as 'Kiki' from Drake's hit song 'In My Feelings'. This news has sparked widespread online discussion and memes.

title: MLB trade rumors: Mets eye $150M Phillies star to boost title hopes
content: New York Mets are reportedly eyeing Philadelphia Phillies slugger Kyle Schwarber, a free agent projected to command around $150 million. Schwarber's MVP-caliber season and clubhouse leadership make him a hot commodity. While Phillies' Bryce Harper hopes he stays, analysts urge caution. His power and veteran presence could significantly boost the Mets' lineup.

title: ‘If patience is tested again ...’: Afghanistan's warning to Pak after truce; how talks unfolded
content: Afghanistan's Interior Minister Sirajuddin Haqqani issued a strong warning to Pakistan, emphasizing that Kabul's patience should not be misconstrued as weakness. Following tense negotiations mediated by Turkey and Qatar, both nations agreed to a fragile ceasefire to halt recent deadly border clashes.  Despite this progress, the border remains closed, with hundreds stranded.

title: 'Some Indian companies': China OKs supply of rare earth magnets to India; what MEA said
content: India has secured approval for some domestic companies to import crucial rare earth magnets from China, vital for automotive and electronics sectors. These licenses follow earlier curbs, enabling access to materials essential for electric vehicles and other high-tech products. However, imports are restricted, prohibiting use in defense and export to the US.

title: 10 new Honda models coming! Big push to expand with SUVs, EVs
content: Honda is set to electrify its Indian presence, announcing a roadmap for ten new models by 2030, including seven SUVs.  The company will offer a diverse range of ICE, hybrid, and electric vehicles across mass and premium segments.  While global EVs will feature ASIMO OS, India's Alpha EV will initially launch without it, with potential future integration.

title: Watch: Pure moments of joy! Jemimah Rodrigues hugs family after innings of a lifetime
content: Jemimah Rodrigues' record-breaking century against Australia propelled India into the ICC Women's World Cup final. The emotional victory was marked by a tearful embrace with her parents, a moment of profound joy and redemption for Rodrigues, who battled anxiety throughout the tour. Her faith and resolve guided her match-winning performance.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock recommendations for today — check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Bajaj Broking Research identifies NBCC and Sagility as top stock picks for October 31, 2025. The Nifty is consolidating within a bullish structure, with support at 25,700-25,500, while Bank Nifty maintains a bullish outlook, eyeing a breakout above 58,577.

title: Epstein files: King Charles strips Prince Andrew of all titles; evicts him from Windsor home
content: King Charles has stripped Prince Andrew of his remaining titles and ordered him to leave his Windsor residence. This decision follows weeks of pressure and Andrew's earlier relinquishment of the Duke of York title due to his association with Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Watch: How Donald and Melania celebrated Halloween at White House
content: President Donald and Melania Trump hosted a comic-book-themed Halloween spectacle on the South Lawn, handing out candy to hundreds of costumed children. The event featured a variety of creative costumes, including pint-sized Trumps and Melanias, and a boy dressed as a toilet. This annual tradition saw the President engaging with attendees, even repeating a candy-on-the-head gesture from a previous year.

title: US waives sanctions on Chabahar port till April; key to India’s access to Afganistan, Central Asia
content: The United States has granted a six-month extension to the sanctions waiver for India's Chabahar port in Iran. This crucial development allows India continued access to Afghanistan and Central Asia, bypassing Pakistan. The port's importance for India's economic ties with Afghanistan is highlighted amidst evolving regional dynamics.

title: 'I love Muhammad': 5 write slogans on temples to frame Muslims; 4 held
content: Four men were arrested in Aligarh for allegedly defacing temple walls with "I love Muhammad" graffiti to frame their Muslim neighbors in a property dispute. Police identified the suspects, noting misspelled slogans that differed from previous protests, leading to their apprehension through technical surveillance. The accused have been jailed under BNS.

title: Tears, Hugs and a Flying Kiss: India's emotional celebrations after beating Australia – Watch
content: India achieved a historic five-wicket victory over defending champions Australia in the ICC Women's World Cup semi0final match, chasing a record 339. Jemimah Rodrigues' unbeaten 127 anchored the monumental chase, supported by Harmanpreet Kaur's aggressive 89. This triumph marked redemption for years of near-misses and secured India's spot in the final.

title: Fans slam Travis Kelce for ‘mocking America’ in viral anthem clip
content: Travis Kelce sparked online debate with his energetic actions during the national anthem before a Chiefs game, leading some to call him "classless." While criticized by some viewers, many defended the tight end, attributing his behavior to his high-energy personality. Teammates and coaches emphasized his continued focus on football and leadership.

title: Bihar polls: NDA set for manifesto launch; focus on creating jobs in IT, MSME sectors
content: The NDA is set to unveil its election manifesto, prioritizing job creation in IT, semiconductors, and MSMEs, offering a distinct alternative to the opposition's focus on government jobs. This strategy aims to leverage local talent and address migration concerns by fostering private sector growth, acknowledging Bihar's current limitations in attracting large manufacturing units.

title: 4 on death row for CRPF terror attack acquitted; court cites lack of proof
content: Allahabad High Court acquitted four men, including two Pakistani nationals, of terrorism charges in a 2007 attack that killed eight CRPF personnel. The court cited prosecution's failure to prove culpability beyond reasonable doubt, instead convicting them under the Arms Act and sentencing them to 10 years rigorous imprisonment. Families of victims expressed anger and disbelief at the verdict.

title: Exclusive: 'Zid' and 'junoon' of Mohammed Shami - The man who refuses to give up
content: Apart from moving the ball both ways, Mohammed Shami also has two ingrained ingredients in him -- "zid" to prove everyone wrong and "junoon" to prove himself again, and again. These have kept Shami going despite facing rejection from his home state Uttar Pradesh in his teens, a knee surgery that almost ended his career, a near-death experience in a road accident, suicidal thoughts during personal crisis, vitriolic trolling after losing to Pakistan, and several other roadblocks.

title: Telangana: Cyclone Montha leaves 6 dead; one missing
content: Cyclone Montha brought torrential rain to Telangana, causing at least six deaths across 12 districts. Flooding inundated homes, toppled trees, and disrupted transport. Warangal and Hanumakonda experienced record rainfall, with victims including a bedridden man drowned in his home and an auto-rickshaw driver swept away by floodwaters.

title: Women's WC: 'Dho Dala!' - Sehwag hails India's dazzling win over Australia in semifinal
content: India's women's cricket team achieved a historic five-wicket victory over Australia, securing a spot in the World Cup final. Jemimah Rodrigues' unbeaten 127 and Harmanpreet Kaur's 89 were pivotal in their record-breaking chase of 339. Virender Sehwag lauded the team's fearless performance, stating they 'dho daala' all criticism with their spectacular win.

title: Kanpur: Man killed over Rs 40 lakh insurance money; mother among 3 held
content: A 47-year-old widow was arrested for allegedly conspiring with her lover and his brother to murder her 22-year-old son. The trio reportedly killed Pradeep Sharma to claim Rs 40 lakh from four life insurance policies taken in his name. The victim's body was staged as a road accident.

title: TOI Imapact: NHAI simplifies process to complete KYV for FASTags
content: The National Highways Authority of India has simplified the Know Your Vehicle (KYV) process for FASTags, removing the need for side vehicle photographs. Users can now upload only a front picture of their number plate and FASTag.

title: De’Aaron Fox out as Spurs face setback ahead of Miami Heat clash tonight
content: The San Antonio Spurs are facing injury concerns as De'Aaron Fox, their $229 million acquisition, is sidelined with a hamstring injury. This has led to increased playing time for rookies Dylan Harper and Stephon Castle. Despite Fox's absence, the Spurs have started the season strong, winning their first three games.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe’s heartbreaking moment centered on daughter Gianna
content: Vanessa Bryant is releasing a photo book, 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever,' featuring cherished memories of Kobe and Gianna Bryant. She shared a touching moment from the 2009 NBA Finals, where Kobe cradled a young Gigi, his focus solely on his daughter's pride. The book aims to preserve these heartfelt moments for the world to remember.

title: ‘Last 4 months have been really hard’: Jemimah breaks down after win
content: Jemimah Rodrigues delivered a match-winning unbeaten 127, guiding India to a record ODI chase of 339 against Australia. This victory secured India's spot in the Women's World Cup final. Rodrigues expressed deep gratitude for her faith and support system. The team's remarkable performance overcame a challenging situation, setting up a historic win.

title: Stefon Diggs responds with cryptic message after K’yanna Barber pregnancy rumors
content: Star player Stefon Diggs faces allegations of another pregnancy while Cardi B is expecting. DJ Akademiks posted about K'yanna Barber's pregnancy, linking it to Diggs. Diggs has remained silent on both situations. Fans are concerned for Cardi B given past marital issues. Diggs posted a quote about not talking too much, fueling speculation.

title: Paralysis cure? Old drug found to help regenerate spinal cord cells
content: A groundbreaking study from UC San Diego has identified Thiorphan, an existing drug, as a potential game-changer for spinal cord injuries. Researchers used advanced bioinformatics to discover its ability to stimulate nerve regrowth and restore motor function in animal models. This discovery offers significant hope for reversing paralysis, with human trials anticipated.

title: Review Akola order against secular policy: Maha to Supreme Court
content: Maharashtra government has approached the Supreme Court seeking a review of its order to form a special investigation team for Akola riot cases, comprising police officials from both Hindu and Muslim communities. The state argues that dividing the police force on religious lines contradicts the nation's secular policies and undermines the neutrality of law enforcement officers.

title: After 15 yrs in jail, couple serving life for murder gets parole for IVF
content: A Gujarat High Court has granted extended parole to a couple convicted of murder, allowing them to undergo IVF treatment. Jayendra Damor and Sejal Bariya, serving life sentences for a 2010 killing, received a rare judicial allowance to pursue parenthood while incarcerated. The court emphasized their surrender after the parole period concludes.

title: 22-year-old criminal shot dead in northeast Delhi's Seelampur
content: The incident took place around 10.40 pm on October 30 when a firing was reported. On reaching the spot, police found a man with gunshot injuries lying near Jama Masjid in the area, they said

title: Jinnah, Savarkar behind India’s partition; BJP now dividing neighbourhoods: Digvijaya Singh
content: Digvijay Singh also said that ‘proofs of citizenship’ are being collected under the guise of the Special Intensive Revision of voter lists in the country.

title: PM Modi fulfilled Sardar Patel’s dream of unified India by abrogating Article 370: Amit Shah
content: Because of Article 370, J&K was not fully integrated into India so PM Modi accomplished the work of Sardar Patel by abrogating the Article and now we have ‘Akhand Bharat’ with us, Mr. Shah said

title: Rashtriya Ekta Diwas: PM Modi pays tributes to Sardar Patel at Statue of Unity in Gujarat
content: The birth anniversary of Patel is being celebrated as Rashtriya Ekta Diwas (National Unity Day) on October 31 since 2014, when Mr. Modi became the Prime Minister for the first time

title: Watch | DMK Vs Election Commission: The SIR controversy explained
content: The DMK and its allies have come out in the open questionig the Election Commission of India’s move to roll out the Special Intensive Revision. We take a look at the controversy

title: Waste treatment factory to resume operations
content: The permission was granted by the committee chaired by District Collector Snehil Kumar Singh after reviewing the field-level inspection reports submitted by the Kerala State Pollution Control Board and the Suchitwa Mission

title: India faces GDP loss of up to 24.7% by 2070 due to climate change: EU official
content: Our private sector brings cutting-edge technologies and expertise in solar, wind, bioenergy, storage, and green hydrogen, while Indian enterprises contribute scale and dynamism, says Dr. Philipp Ackermann, Ambassador of Germany to India

title: Ernakulam DDMA plans measures to prevent student drowning incidents
content: Despite awareness campaigns, the number of drowning deaths keeps increasing. They happen because of carelessness, says an official of District Disaster Management Authority

title: Bihar Assembly election LIVE: NDA set to release joint manifesto today
content: The Opposition's alliance in its manifesto promised that women would receive financial assistance of Rs 2,500 per month from December 1 for the next five years under 'Mai-Behin Maan Yojana'.

title: Traffic chaos reigns as elevated corridor works on Paradise-Dairy Farm stretch begins
content: Motorists reported delays between 10 minutes to over 30 minutes on the adjoining internal roads due to the road closure and diversions

title: Cyclone Montha | Ministers Ponnam, Tummala assure relief to farmers who suffered crop loss
content: Centre should declare damage caused by unprecedented rainfall in Telangana a natural calamity and extend help to mitigate woes of rain-affected people, says Ponnam Prabhakar

title: Karnataka jealous of Andhra Pradesh’s rise, says BJP leader
content: “The Congress cannot digest India’s growth. The comments made by Karnataka Minister M.B. Patil shows their frustration and jealousy,” said Sadineni Yamini Sarma

title: Karnataka to seek ₹1,545 crore from Centre from NDRF for losses during Southwest Monsoon
content: Though the actual damage of infrastructure is more than ₹ 5,000 crores in Karnataka, we have sought ₹ 1,545 crores as per the NDRF norms: H.K. Patil

title: Mamata urges people not to get provoked by SIR, says no legitimate citizen will be left out
content: The West Bengal Chief Minister who had dubbed the SIR as National Register of Citizens through back door, reiterated that her government “will not allow NRC to be implemented in Bengal — neither through the front door, nor through the back door”

title: The internal rewiring of a grand old party: Congress focuses on DCCs for revival
content: As part of its newly launched leadership selection programme, Sangathan Srijan Abhiyan, the Congress is banking on empowered district-level leadership. After extensive screening and consultations, the 139-year-old party will appoint District Congress Committee presidents through a merit-based process across States. Sandeep Phukan explores the process and the criticism

title: Government relaxes green cover norms for industrial projects
content: Against a 33% green cover mandated earlier, industrial estates can earmark 10% for plantation while individual industries can have 15% greenbelt in their respective project areas

title: Chargesheet submitted in gang-rape of medical college student in West Bengal’s Durgapur
content: The chargesheet comes after 20 days of the horrific crime; charges have been pressed against the six accused for rape, gangrape, extortion, dacoity among other sections of BNS

title: India firmly believes in rule of Law of the Sea, says DMK MP
content: Thamizhachi Thangapandian introduces Prof. Bimal N. Patel, India’s candidate for the International Tribunal for the Law of the Sea (ITLOS) in New York

title: Cyprus ready to be part of IMEC: Foreign Minister Kombos
content: Constantinos Kombos said that the Cyprus-India ties are not aimed at “counterbalancing” any regional power and stand on their own “merit”

title: Quack arrested near Arani who offered medical treatment for nearly a decade
content: The quack offered medical treatment to patients in the village for nearly a decade without professional qualification

title: Fisherfolk in Machilipatnam reel under livelihood loss due to cyclone
content: Many fisherfolk have been out of work for the past one week as warning came right after Deepavali, forcing them to borrow money from boat owners to run their families, forcing them deeper into the debt trap

title: A call for sustainability in space science
content: Minoo Rathnasabapathy, from the MIT Media Lab and a leading voice in responsible space systems, said that in order to achieve space sustainability, emerging nations must have access to available data

title: IIT-Madras researchers achieve ‘soft landing’ for vertical take-off aircraft and UAVs
content: Combining real-time hybrid rocket thruster with a virtual simulation, the researchers “achieved the necessary velocity for soft landing, a crucial feature for all craft ranging from planetary landing of unmanned or manned exploration module to terrestrial landing of a VTOL (vertical take-off and landing) aircraft”.

title: How Kerala eradicated extreme poverty
content: On November 1, the Kerala government is set to declare the State extreme poverty-free, the culmination of a four-year-long strenuous exercise. Four lakh enumerators fanned out across the State and identified the most marginalised. The local bodies then devised micro-plans to suit each family. The government claims that the programme uplifted 1,03,099 people from extreme poverty. S.R. Praveen interacts with some of the beneficiaries and also listens to dissenting voices

title: Sengottaiyan meets expelled AIADMK leaders Panneerselvam,  Dhinakaran, and Sasikala
content: Palaniswami accuses Sengottaiyan of working against the AIADMK for long, and vows action against him. He holds him responsible for the party’s defeat in Anthiyur in the 2021 Assembly election

title: Devanathan Yadav now says he requires six more months to mobilise ₹100 crore
content: The accused in the Mylapore Hindu Permanent Fund Nidhi scam informs the Madras High Court that he could not raise the money as most of the documents related to the immovable properties are with the police

title: Excerpt | Recalling Mumbai's Last Hostage Situation From 2008 - When A Gunman Took Over A Bus
content: On October 27, 2008, at around 10:30 am, the news trickled in that a double-decker BEST bus numbered 332 had been hijacked at Kurla.

title: Delhi Police Opposes Umar Khalid Bail Plea, Calls Riots 'Regime Change Op'
content: Calling the 2020 Delhi riots a "planned operation for regime change" allegedly orchestrated by Umar Khalid and others, the Delhi Police on Thursday vehemently opposed their bail petitions in the Supreme Court.

title: UP Man Kills Sister, Stuffs Body In Bag. When Confronted, Says "Its Wheat"
content: A man in Uttar Pradesh's Gorakhpur who murdered his sister and stuffed her body in a sack told the police that the large bag contained wheat.

title: Opinion: Opinion | How To Lose Your Seat In 30 Days?
content: Since 2014, at least 12 sitting opposition ministers have been arrested; nine of them from non-BJP-ruled states. Eight crossed the 30-day custody mark. Under the bill, they'd have been automatically stripped of office despite never being convicted.

title: Amit Shah's 'Italy' Retort To Rahul Gandhi's Chhath Puja Remark
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Thursday launched a stinging attack on Rahul Gandhi, charging the Congress leader with betraying his "maternal roots in Italy" by denigrating Chhath Puja festival.

title: American Pitbull, Bulldog Among 6 Dog Breeds Banned In Chandigarh
content: The Municipal Corporation of Chandigarh has banned six aggressive dog breeds, including American Bulldog, American Pitbull and Bull Terrier, for public safety, as it notified the Pet and Community Dogs Bye-laws.

title: Google To Offer Gemini Pro AI Plan Free To All Reliance Jio Users
content: Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai highlighted the benefits for Reliance Jio users as he expressed enthusiasm over both companies shaking hands to accelerate the adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) across India.

title: Afghanistan, Pakistan Agree To Extend Ceasefire After Talks In Turkey
content: After days of tense diplomacy in Istanbul, Afghanistan and Pakistan have concluded their high-stakes negotiations aimed at defusing the simmering crisis along their volatile border.

title: Colombian President Struggling To Get Salary After US Sanctions: Lawyer
content: Colombian President Gustavo Petro is struggling to access his salary after being hit with US sanctions, his lawyer said.

title: Mark Zuckerberg's Net Worth Drops As Meta's AI Plan Spooks Investors
content: Mark Zuckerberg fell to fifth place on the Bloomberg Billionaires Index  the lowest in nearly two years  as investors spooked by Meta Platforms Incs planned $30 billion debt sale sent the companys shares spiraling.

title: How Trump's Comments On Nuclear Testing Sparked Fears, Confusion In US
content: President Donald Trump shocked the world by announcing on social media that he had asked the US military to "start testing our Nuclear Weapons", saying the United States could not fall behind Russia and China.

title: From Prince To Pariah: All About Downfall Of Andrew
content: The downfall of Andrew, formerly known as prince and born into a life of royal privilege as the son of the late Queen Elizabeth II, was complete on Thursday, when his brother King Charles III moved to strip him of all his titles.

title: 'Our Goal Is Firm': China On Track To Land Astronauts On Moon By 2030
content: China said Thursday it's on track to land astronauts on the moon by 2030 as it introduced the next crew of astronauts who will head to its space station as part of the country's ambitious plans to be a leader in space exploration.

title: 2 Silvery Gibbons, One Dead, One Alive, Seized At Mumbai Airport
content: Mumbai Customs seized two endangered silvery gibbons, one of which had died, at the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport (CSMIA) from a passenger coming from Bangkok, officials said on Thursday.

title: JD Vance Warns Of Air Travel "Disaster" Amid US Government Shutdown
content: The ongoing US government shutdown, now completing one month, has sparked acute concerns in the aviation sector as the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) and other agencies struggle with depleted staff and unpaid essential workers.

title: Family Of Andrew's Accuser Say Her Courage "Brought Down A Prince"
content: The family of Virginia Giuffre, who accused Andrew of sexual assault, hailed the British king's decision to strip his brother of his royal titles, saying her courage had "brought down a prince".

title: Prince Andrew Loses Royal Titles, Told To Vacate Mansion Over Epstein Ties
content: Britain's King Charles has moved to strip his younger brother Andrew of his titles and honours, and force him out of his home, Buckingham Palace said on Thursday, over his ties with the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: "Regressive And Irresponsible": Iran Slams Trump's Nuclear Testing Order
content: Iran's foreign minister called on Thursday US plans to resume nuclear testing "regressive and irresponsible", after a surprise directive by US President Donald Trump.

title: Pakistan, Afghanistan Agree To Continue Ceasefire, Says Turkey
content: Pakistan and Afghanistan agreed on Thursday to extend a ceasefire during talks in Istanbul after the worst border clashes between the neighbours in years, according to Turkey which mediated the talks along with Qatar.

title: Allahabad High Court cites ‘defect’ in probe, commutes death sentence of four in CRPF camp attack case
content: The court said that the “prosecution miserably failed to prove the case against the accused for the principal offence beyond reasonable doubt”

title: Social and Educational Survey: Can register online till Nov. 10
content: Though the survey was supposed to have been completed by October 7, it was extended twice since the progress had been slow in the initial days

title: Sardar Patel’s vision and the meaning of national unity today
content: Unity, Patel taught us, is a task renewed in every generation. It must be defended against the fragmenting impulses of indifference, ignorance and regionalism

title: NIA seeks more details from U.S. on Tahawwur Rana in 26/11 Mumbai attacks case
content: Following a court order in June, the agency has submitted a compliance report under Section 207 of the Criminal Procedure Code about the supply of documents linked to the previous chargesheet filed in 2011.

title: Closed, duplicate entries push GBA’s survey completion in Bengaluru above 100%
content: The survey is set to conclude on October 31, with online extension open for voluntary participation until November 10

title: ‘Caste-neutral’ women voters may rally behind Nitish
content: Will the Nitish Kumar government’s decision to hand over ₹10,000 to 1.2 crore women, timed for the elections, prove to be a game changer?

title: Congress demands SIT, judicial probe into Maharashtra woman doctor’s death
content: The party said that the incident exposed the “mentality” of the BJP and the RSS “towards the deprived and women” and added that the doctor had been fighting political pressure from a former BJP MP

title: Over 50 residents held for opposing allocation of land to displaced people
content: A resident says the govt. land should be used to improve infrastructure facilities such as schools, health centres that will benefit the villagers

title: Annual parade to mark Sardar Patel’s birth anniversary from this year: Amit Shah
content: Mr. Shah said that Prime Minister Narendra Modi will take the salute of the grand parade to be held at Ekta Nagar in Gujarat

title: India ready to help Afghanistan build hydroelectric facilities: MEA
content: Cooperation to build hydel power projects was part of a joint statement issued during a visit by the Taliban’s Acting Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi on October 10

title: Government will introduce new Seeds Act soon, says Agriculture Minister
content: Both the UPA and NDA governments were unsuccessful in amending the Seeds Act in the past due to opposition from farmers’ organisations

title: SC asks Guruvayur Devaswom to conduct Udayasthamana puja on Vrishchikam Ekadasi as per tradition
content: Bench  says  primary obligation of the Tantri is to safeguard and increase the vitality of the deity by adhering to the traditions and not alter the date of the puja to suit the convenience of the worshippers

title: Trump-Xi bonhomie and reference to G-2 may impact India and Quad
content: External Affairs Ministry non-committal on outcome of U.S.-China summit in South Korea; experts warn of ripple effects in region; as a result of the talks, the U.S. has reduced tariffs on China to 47%, making India (and Brazil) at 50%, the highest tariffed country

title: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra calls NEP ‘ideological brainwashing’, Education Minister says ‘political opportunism’
content: Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan reasons that if ‘empowering children with innovation, critical thinking, and pride in Bharat’s heritage is ideological, then yes, the ideology is nation-building’

title: 380 cases booked, 63 private buses seized in crackdown on unsafe private vehicles after Kurnool fire tragedy
content: The inspection, conducted between October 24 and 30, involved 12 dedicated enforcement teams checking private buses in Attibele and Devanahalli, key entry points to Bengaluru

title: Karnataka High Court stays probe in Dharmasthala mass burial case as activists challenge FIR registered based on their own campaign
content: Additional State Public Prosecutor pointed out to the court that the petitioners themselves had spearheaded the movement for registering FIR

title: Union Minister of State for Railways inspects Yesvantpur Coaching Depot
content: During the visit, the Minister took stock of the various facilities available at the depot and assessed its overall performance under the ongoing Special Cleanliness Campaign

title: India begins major tri-Service drill along western border with Pakistan
content: ‘Trishul’ showcases the joint operational capability and strategic preparedness of the Indian Army, Navy, and the Air Force

title: Congress asks Home Minister Amit Shah if it is the EC’s responsibility to ‘identify’ foreigners
content: Congress asks how many infiltrators had been detected as part of the EC’s special intensive revision exercise in Bihar

title: Over 100 absentee BLOs in West Bengal join SIR after suspension warning
content: Recruitment, appointment, and training of the State’s BLOs started earlier this year; 143 absentee BLOs had been issued warnings of suspension by election officials

title: Fans cheer as actor Mammootty is back in Kochi after eight months
content: The actor was working in Mahesh Narayanan’s movie Patriot when he took a break amid concerns about his health

title: State-wide crackdown nets 263 in cyber financial fraud cases
content: The Ernakulam Rural police recorded the highest number of arrests in the drive, nabbing 43 suspects. Malappuram came second with 30 arrests, followed by Kannur City and Kozhikode City

title: KPCC to constitute core leadership group for quick decision-making at election time
content: The committee will supersede other organisational panels, including the ‘oversized’ Political Affairs Committee. Hassan says similar apex leadership groups will be constituted at at the district and Assembly constituency levels for effective electioneering

title: Bharat Ratna for Thevar just an add-on to his enduring legacy: Edappadi K. Palaniswami
content: Political leaders including Vaiko, Seeman, Selvaperunthagai G.K. Mani and V.K. Sasikala pay floral tributes to the statue of Muthuramalinga Thevar at Pasumpon on his 118th Jayanthi festival and 63rd Guru Puja

title: What Aidan Hutchinson's extension means, and which pass rushers are getting paid next
content: aidan Hutchinson has been a star for the team from day one . he finished second in the 2022 draft with a team-leading 9.5 sacks and a pro Bowl nod . the move means the franchise will have its best pass rusher for years to come .

title: Pushed to the periphery, Nwaneri seizes his chance to shine for Arsenal
content: Ethan Nwaneri is still only 18 and has had to wait for a moment like this . the 18-year-old was one of arsenal's breakthrough stars of last season . but fortunes have conspired to complicate his continued involvement in the first team .

title: Edgecombe overtakes Flagg as ROY favorite; what it means for betting, fantasy
content: VJ Edgecombe ( +110 ) has officially surpassed Cooper Flagg ( +115 ) as the favorite to win the NBA's Rookie of the Year, according to ESPN BET . he is off to an amazing start, averaging 22.3 PPG, 5.8 RPG, 5.5 APG, 3.0 3PG and 1.5 SPG through his first four games while helping the Philadelphia 76ers to a surprising 4-0 start .

title: How No. 11 Trinity Jones adds to a growing Clemson class; more girls' commit fits
content: there are 17 five-star recruits in the girls' SC Next 100 class of 2026 as of mid-october . the latest commitment comes from no. 11 Trinity Jones . we can make some informed projections . what's next for those programs that have signed these top-tier talents?

title: Projecting Jai Lucas' first top commitment as Miami head coach, more recruit fits
content: there are currently 19 five-stars atop the SC Next 100 player rankings for the men's college basketball class of 2026 . six are off the board, with Miami getting its first top commitment of the Jai Lucas era in no. 16 Caleb Gaskins .

title: NFL Week 9 arrivals, featuring Dolphins' Aaron Brewer's Michael Myers mask
content: week 9 of the season marks another opportunity for players to make the most of their fits . the calendar entered the first week of November, but that didn't put an end to summer weather fits, or mark the beginning of cozy looks . here's a look at the top fits from week 9 .

title: How Trey Yesavage met the moment and pushed the Dodgers to the brink
content: Trey Yesavage hits out 12 in a showtopping performance for the blue Jays vs. the Dodgers . the 22-year-old right-handed rookie was under attack during game 5 of the world series . his first game this season came in April for Single-A Dunedin .

title: Class rankings: Texas Tech climbs; fallout from firings continues
content: the player rankings update helped classes at Texas Tech, Indiana and Minnesota climb . the bigger picture to watch is how the slew of current and potential job openings will impact the class rankings . classes at Florida and LSU bring a great deal of intrigue as they are ranked inside the top 15 .

title: 17 kids rescued, man shot dead after Mumbai studio hostage drama
content: a 45-year-old documentary filmmaker held 17 children hostage for two hours . he was shot in the chest purportedly in self-defence . police commando team stormed the studio after failed negotiations . hostage drama played out after the captor released a video saying he wanted "simple answers"

title: 🎃 LeBron announces Halloween children's book
content: "Happy Spooky Halloween" is a 32-page picture book with illustrations by Ariel Landy . the book is set to release on July 21 by publisher HarperCollins . "you guys know how much I love Halloween and this one's going to be special," James says .

title: 'Are you ready to go all-in?' Inside the talks on Logan Cooley's $80M Mammoth contract
content: Logan Cooley was eligible for an extension this summer . the 21-year-old was fixated on eight years, the max they could offer . he is 21 years old, and it's the biggest decision he's made in his entire life, not even close .

title: Ranking the top 50 NHL prospects: Who follows Schaefer, Demidov?
content: the Islanders lead the list with five in my top 50, followed by the blackhawks, sharks and mammoth with four apiece . no. 1 draft pick Matthew Schaefer is the only defenseman in NHL history to record a point in his first five games .

title: What to expect at the trade deadline for every team: Perfect fits, candidates to move, more
content: the 2025 trade deadline is Tuesday at 4 p.m. ET . we're previewing the deadline for all 32 teams . it's a short-term need that could be addressed for the 32 rosters . our NFL Nation reporters picked out one candidate to budge .
